items.sentence: You\'re the worst thing that ever happened to Tom.
Do you know a man named Tom Jackson by any chance?
Tom knew right away that something had gone wrong.
Tom thinks that he\'s different from other people.
I wonder whether or not Tom will be here tomorrow.
Tom mistakenly ate his entree with his salad fork.
Tom moved over so that Mary could sit next to him.
I suspected that Tom had fallen in love with Mary.
I talked Tom into helping me clean out the garage.
Tom wondered how long he\'d have to wait for Mary.
